text: Try to use module id instead of name of module.

The ID and name are synonymous in this case. For more info see <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context#retrieving-parameters-from-modules-already-rendered-on-the-template|the HubSpot documentation>
then you might be pasting the wrong module name. :slightly_smiling_face:
Unfortunately everything is correct on my end. This syntax works for regular modules, but on global modules nothing is returned

Hi,
I have been working with Engagement API <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/engagements/create_engagement>
to integrate RingCentral calls with HubSpot and I am able to create an Engagement (see Image)
but Duration is not appearing.
